message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can offer you $160 for the product. I hope this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While $160 is a fair offer, I'm aiming for something closer to $180. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to go up to $170 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
